summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the east side of 16th Avenue, from East Jefferson Street to a point 100 feet north thereof, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon and providing for the necessary surface drainage,, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2433 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
